titleStmt.title: Poems written by the Right Honorable William earl of Pembroke, lord steward of his Majesties houshold. Whereof many of which are answered by way of repartee, by Sr Benjamin Ruddier, knight. With several distinct poems, written by them occasionally, and apart.
titleStmt.author: Herbert, William, Sir, 1507-1570.
Rudyerd, Benjamin, Sir, 1572-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Inman, and are to be sold by James Magnes, in Russel-street, near the Piazza, in Covent-Garden,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
